name: tag(at:unit:scheme:tokenRange:)
desc: Returns a tag for a single scheme, for a given linguistic unit, at the specified character position.
declaration:
func tag(at charIndex: Int, 
    unit: NSLinguisticTaggerUnit, 
  scheme: NSLinguisticTagScheme, 
tokenRange: NSRangePointer?) -> NSLinguisticTag?
